comments.content: It is Lobster by Pablo Impallari. Solved by Renko

Please don't do font IDs outside the ID section.  
 [http://typophile.com/node/115762#comment-576139](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713082059/http:/typophile.com/node/115762#comment-576139 "http://typophile.com/node/115762#comment-576139")

hhp

The identification <cite>was</cite> done [in the ID section](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713082059/http:/typophile.com/node/115772). kruppp is the original poster who only repeated Renko’s answer here. Why not?

Just so people don't get the wrong idea. A link to the answer is better I think.

hhp
